thread.title: Nadal Notches a Win
thread.title_full: Nadal Notches a Win - The New York Times

author: The Associated Press
title: Nadal Notches a Win
text:
Rafael Nadal beat a top-five player for the first time in more than a year with a 6-2, 6-1 win over Stan Wawrinka to reach the semifinals of the Shanghai Masters. Novak Djokovic also advanced, holding off Bernard Tomic in a tight first-set tiebreaker before closing it out, 7-6 (6), 6-1. Nadal had not won against a top-five player since last year’s French Open final, when he defeated Djokovic for his 14th Grand Slam title.
Nadal will play Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the semifinals after Tsonga topped Kevin Anderson, 7-6 (6), 5-7, 6-4. Djokovic will play Andy Murray, a 6-1, 6-3 winner over Tomas Berdych.
■ Venus Williams closed in on a spot in the season-ending WTA Finals by beating Alizé Cornet, 6-1, 6-1, to reach the Hong Kong Open semifinals. Williams will meet Jelena Jankovic, who beat Daria Gavrilova, 6-1, 6-1. Angelique Kerber and Samantha Stosur also advanced and will face each other in the semifinals.
